Test Name: Fibroblast Culture for Biochemical or Molecular Testing
Specimen Type: Chorionic villi, products of conception, or tissue specimens
Purpose: To culture fibroblasts from chorionic villi, products of conception, or tissue specimens for subsequent biochemical or molecular testing.
Container: Sterile container with tissue culture or transport medium
Equipment: Sterile culture media, laminar flow hood, incubator (37Â°C, 5% CO2), sterile forceps and scalpels, tissue culture dishes or flasks, centrifuge, inverted microscope, hemocytometer or cell counter, trypsin-EDTA solution
